problem_context.app_description: Concurrent failures across multiple services: social network, hotel reservation, and astronomy shop

detection.description: Detection should be "Yes" when fault is injected

localization.description: List of faulty service names that must be identified

sub_oracles.name: 0-TargetPortMisconfigMitigationOracle
sub_oracles.description: Service targetPort must be reset to 9090 and all pods must be Running

sub_oracles.name: 1-MitigationOracle
sub_oracles.description: All pods must be Running and all containers must be Ready

sub_oracles.name: 2-ServiceEndpointMitigationOracle
sub_oracles.description: Service endpoint selector must be corrected
